cross: Cattleya loddigesii x Cattleya Mari's Song

measurements.description: Three closely arranged flowers on one upright inflorescence; sepals medium lavender; petals spatulate, slightly undulate and dentiuclate, medium lavender, close purple spotting on midrib; lip broadly flared, undulate and denticulate, lavender, strong purple triangular splash apically, white throat; column bulbous, white; substance very firm; texture matte.
